fields.description: The types of matches made to the component within the project
The approval status of the component
A summary of the security risks associated with the component
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
A summary of the version risks associated with the component
A summary of the license risks associated with the component
URL to the representation of the component's version
The policy status of the component
The date the component was released
The total file match count for each component version
The origins of the component
A summary of the activity risks associated with the component
URL to the representation of the component
The combination of licenses assigned to the component
The display status of the license
URL to the representation of the license
The relation of contained licenses. Possible Values: [CONJUNCTIVE, DISJUNCTIVE]
Related licenses which follow the same structure as the license field
A summary of the operational risks associated with the component
Label distinguishing the version from other versions of the component
A summary of the components activity
A summary of the component review
The review status of the component
Description of development activity on the component
The usages of the component within the project

links.description: Resource representing the comments of the component
Resource representing the policys rules associated with the component
Resource representing the vulnerabilities of the component
Resource representing the files matched to the component
Resource representing the passing, violation, or override state of policies for the component
Resource representing the origins available. Only present for entries with an associated component version
